name: Pop Meals
headline: Pop Meals is a restaurant chain without chefs. All recipes are√¢¬Ä¬¶
description: Pop is building Asia√¢¬Ä¬ôs leading food brands through a network of cloud kitchens and tech-enabled QSR outlets. Funded with over $28m by Y Combinator and leading tech investors from Silicon Valley, Europe and Asia, we are expanding rapidly across Asia.

### Salted Egg Buttermilk Chicken
![left arrow icon](https://image.popcontent.link/new-website/common/ArrowLeft.svg)
![rating icon](https://image.popcontent.link/like_order_again_icon.svg)
100% order again
Delicious and insanely addictive, this Salted Egg Buttermilk Chicken is going to keep you coming back for more. The best part about this meal is the buttery, perfectly salty and oh so rich Salted Egg Buttermilk sauce. It coats the crispy chicken and fluffly rice like a creamy dream!
[ORDER NOW](https://popmeals.com/<https:/app.popmeals.com.my/JAE9>)
![right arrow icon](https://image.popcontent.link/new-website/common/ArrowRight.svg)
##### News Feed
# See what the#POPfam is saying about us
[![popmeals_my image](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/poplogo.jpeg)@popmeals_myPop Meals @ DPulze Cyberjaya![post image](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/newsfeed_post_img_1.jpeg) What makes Mee Kari a truly Malaysian dish? It's the: 1. Rich, delicious coconut-based broth. The combination of creamy coconut milk and flavourful spices is utterly addicting! 2. Classic yellow noodles, slices of tender chicken, bean sprouts, long beans, fish cake, tofu puffs! All must haves! 3. A perfectly boiled egg! Could it get any better? Yes it can! Pair it with a cold Teh Ais Padu at only RM13.99! Order our Kombo Nasional now! üì∏ shoutout to @amaris.official for the pose üòç ![Instagram icon](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/instagram_logo.svg)](https://popmeals.com/<https:/www.instagram.com/p/CTwUYDWlJlv/>)[![magdiigles image](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/newsfeed_post_profile_img_2.jpeg)@magdiigles![post image](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/newsfeed_post_img_2.jpeg)Noodles that will satisfy those hunger pangs instantly!![Instagram icon](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/instagram_logo.svg)](https://popmeals.com/<https:/www.instagram.com/p/CTgpJ9UHel-/>)[![ayurafikah image](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/newsfeed_post_profile_img_5.jpeg)@ayurafikah![post image](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/newsfeed_post_img_5.jpeg)Tak nak keluar rumah, penat nak masak tapi lapar. Hah! Korang boleh order dari @popmeals_my . . Pelbagai hidangan menarik boleh dicuba. Ada mi kari, nasi ayam goreng kunyit dan pelbagai lagi. Apatah sekarang ada Kombo Nasional, set hidangan yang datangnya dengan air minuman sekali. . . Dan korang juga boleh sertai challenge yang dianjurkan. ![Instagram icon](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/instagram_logo.svg)](https://popmeals.com/<https:/www.instagram.com/p/CTYpsQyF5G7/>)
[![ienaeliena image](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/newsfeed_post_profile_img_3.jpeg)@ienaeliena![post image](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/newsfeed_post_img_3.jpeg) Korang #gengbiru ke #gengkuning? Iena suka Nasi Kerabu Ayam Goreng dari @popmeals_my üòÅ So iena #gengbiru hehe.. Korang da cuba ke belum? Klu blm and nk cuba. Guna code POPJUARA5 utk Enjoy RM5 OFF utk first order. Bukan nasi kerabu je. Istimewa ramadhan ni ade nasi kunyit ayam goreng jugak tau. Atau korang blh order mcm iena ni dapat dua2 sekali and dapat kuih dan jugak air. Haa order Kombo nikmat ramadhan set berbaloi tauüòÅüòÅ ![Instagram icon](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/instagram_logo.svg)](https://popmeals.com/<https:/www.instagram.com/p/COSqKYEFEek/>)[![syedot.asmr image](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/newsfeed_post_profile_img_4.jpeg)@syedot.asmr![post image](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/newsfeed_post_img_4.jpeg)BERBUKA MAKAN NASI KERABU & NASI KUNYIT AYAM GORENG | @popmeals_my ‚†Ä ‚†Ä Sempurnakan set Berbuka Puasa anda dengan Pop Meals! Hanya dengan RM33.99 untuk Kombo Nikmat Ramadan Set Berbaloi. ![Instagram icon](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/instagram_logo.svg)](https://popmeals.com/<https:/www.instagram.com/p/COIGkDvHEZ4/>)[![perryfoodblog image](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/newsfeed_post_profile_img_6.jpeg)@perryfoodblog![post image](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/newsfeed_post_img_6.jpeg)Tried out the Golden Salted Egg Butter Chicken. I love the golden gravy a lot. Very very captivating! Swipe to the end for a golden surprise! Setia Alam just added Pop Meals to the family yo Oh and btw, do you know you can get a free whopping RM18? That‚Äôs right! I ain‚Äôt kidding. Rating: 8.5/10 üìçLocation: Pop Meals, Setia City Mall Install the PopMeals app, go to rewards section and key in the code PERRYQWF to redeem your RM18. There is a saying there‚Äôs no such thing as a free lunch. With my promo code, your lunch can be free! #malaysia #foodie #butter #chicken #selangor #popmeals. ![Instagram icon](https://dahmakan-images.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/new-website/Landing+page/newsfeed/instagram_logo.svg)](https://popmeals.com/<https:/www.instagram.com/p/CYTl8A9vPsf/>)

generated_description:
### Pop Meals: A Chef-less Dining Revolution

**Overview**
Pop Meals is a forward-thinking restaurant chain based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, dedicated to reshaping the food service industry. They operate a network of cloud kitchens and tech-enabled quick-service restaurant (QSR) outlets, allowing for a fast and efficient dining experience‚Äîwithout the traditional chef workforce. This model not only minimizes overhead costs but also maximizes scalability, making it a significant player in Asia's food service landscape.

**Foundation and Expansion**
Founded under the umbrella of Y Combinator in the S17 batch, Pop Meals has quickly garnered attention and funding, raising over $28 million from a mix of Silicon Valley, European, and Asian investors. This financial backing is fueling their rapid expansion across the Asian market.

**Mission**
Their mission is clear: to build Asia's leading food brands through technology and innovative food solutions. They focus on ensuring delicious meals come at accessible prices, capitalizing on the growth of the food delivery market that has surged in recent years.

**Operations**
The company employs a robust team of 153 individuals, all dedicated to servicing a growing customer base. Through their sustainable and tech-savvy approach, Pop Meals has served over 5.5 million meals and garnered a happy customer base of more than 884,000. Their operational model, which includes ghost kitchens, is positioned precisely to meet the increasing demand for food delivery services in Southeast Asia.

**Key Offerings**
Pop Meals stands out with its diverse menu, which includes exciting dishes like Salted Egg Buttermilk Chicken, alongside other Malaysian favorites. Customers can order through their easy-to-use app for delivery, pickup, or dine-in experiences, alongside a chance to earn rewards. This combination of convenience and quality drives their appeal to a tech-savvy audience.

**Community Engagement**
Pop Meals isn't just about food; it actively engages with its community through social media and local partnerships. Their campaigns often encourage user-generated content and prompt happy diners to share their experiences, thereby building a sense of community around the brand.

### In Conclusion
Pop Meals is at the intersection of food and technology, offering a unique and scalable business model that resonates well with modern consumers. If you‚Äôre in Asia and looking for a new dining experience that prioritizes quality, convenience, and affordability, Pop Meals might just be your next go-to.  You can check them out at [Pop Meals](https://popmeals.com) for more information or to place an order!
